mapper.select: SELECT T4.review_id, T1.order_id, T2.user_id, T3.store_name, T4.rating, T4.content, T4.created_date FROM orders T1 LEFT JOIN users T2 ON T1.user_id = T2.user_id LEFT JOIN store T3 ON T1.store_id = T3.store_id LEFT JOIN review T4 ON T1.order_id = T4.order_id WHERE T2.login_id = #{login_id} ORDER BY T1.order_id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(user_id, store_id, menu_id, rating, content, picture_url, created_date, modified_date, status ) VALUES((SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE login_id = #{login_id}), #{store_id}, #{menu_id}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{picture_url}, NOW(), NOW(), #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET user_id=#{user_id}, content=#{content} WHERE id = #{review_id}
